message: There are thousands of these slice and dice sites on the web. Are there any good ones that you would recommend? Why do you recommend them?
http://htmlburger.com/ I think the front-page says it all; but I've heard really good things about them too.
if you don't mind having horrible code with tables, you can slice up your own image in photoshop and export the code. it's not terribly difficult.

Codemyconcept is good with WordPress builds, but they don't build custom backends. It's just the basic theme chop-up. If you have the time I'd pay them for an HTML chop up and change it to a WordPress one myself if I needed to. I used them last year for a Magento build and it was awful. Their customer service is great though. I was just expecting more from them than I should have.
I would recommend sofyma WEB from Bulgaria as I have been using them for a while now with excellent results and a great price.
